channel.title: Problem. Help Please
channel.description:
Hey guys. :| I have a problem, and once I fix this.
I can release the server to the Public :D So... Whenever someone logs out, gets kicked or just disconnects. They can't disconnect again.
Here is an example of me logging out, and here is what I got on the runserver.bat
[code]Satan's Isle : Second Pk source , is ONLINE ! ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1290 Steph is signing onto server. [client-1-Steph]: Case 185: Action Button: 3144 [client-1-Steph]: Case 185: Action Button: 3146 [client-1-Steph]: Case 185: Action Button: 3148 [client-1-Steph]: Case 185: Action Button: 3147 [client-1-Steph]: Case 185: Action Button: 3145 [client-1-Steph]: Case 185: Action Button: 3148 [client-1-Steph]: playerCommand: pickup 0995 1000000 [client-1-Steph]: RemoveItem 5: 1712 InterID: 3900 slot: 6 Item2ID: 4 Item2ID3: 1712 Item2ID4: 8240 Game saved for player Steph ClientHandler: Client Steph disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:1311 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1311 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:1312 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1312 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:1313 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1313 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:1314 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1314 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:1315 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:1315 [/code]
Hope someone can help? :)

item.title: Problem. Help Please

z0mg.

item.title: Problem. Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

bmxr4c3r709:

I got that same error, but it just went away after a day. =\

Well, It’s not like that. The source I downloaded was Anti-Leech meaning that there was a small error or faulty in the source. I’ve talked to the owner of the source, (As I know him quite well) and he’s telling me how to fix it.

Thanks for all your help guys. Ciao <3

Read full topic

item.title: Problem. Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

Yea, it either comes up with…
“Error connecting to server. Must be down.
Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.”

OR

“No response from server
Please try using a different world.”

Hmmm? Any Ideas?

Read full topic
